mapper.select: SELECT P.*, if(C.CNT IS NULL,0,C.CNT) CNT FROM category P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CATE_PARENT_IDX,COUNT(CATE_PARENT_IDX) CNT FROM category where CATE_PARENT_IDX is not null GROUP BY CATE_PARENT_IDX ) C ON P.CATE_IDX = C.CATE_PARENT_IDX WHERE P.CATE_PARENT_IDX IS NULL AND CATE_TYPE='CATEGORY' GROUP BY CATE_IDX order by CATE_ORDER

SELECT P.*, if(C.CNT IS NULL,0,C.CNT) CNT FROM category P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CATE_PARENT_IDX,COUNT(CATE_PARENT_IDX) CNT FROM category where CATE_PARENT_IDX is not null GROUP BY CATE_PARENT_IDX ) C ON P.CATE_IDX = C.CATE_PARENT_IDX WHERE P.CATE_PARENT_IDX = #{CATE_PARENT_IDX} AND CATE_TYPE='CATEGORY' GROUP BY CATE_IDX order by CATE_ORDER
SELECT CATE_IDX, CATE_NAME FROM category WHERE CATE_IDX IS NOT NULL and CATE_PARENT_IDX = #{cateIdx} AND CATE_TYPE='CATEGORY'
SELECT MAX(CATE_ORDER) FROM category WHERE CATE_DEPTH=#{CATE_DEPTH} AND CATE_TYPE=#{CATE_TYPE}

SELECT PARENT.CATE_NAME PARENT_CATE_NAME ,CATEGORY.CATE_IDX ,CATEGORY.CATE_NAME FROM CATEGORY LEFT JOIN CATEGORY PARENT ON CATEGORY.CATE_PARENT_IDX=PARENT.CATE_IDX WHERE CATEGORY.CATE_DEPTH=#{CATE_DEPTH} AND CATEGORY.CATE_TYPE='CATEGORY' ORDER BY PARENT.CATE_ORDER,CATEGORY.CATE_ORDER

sql.if: AND CREATED_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{CREATED_DATE}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{CREATED_DATE}, 13)
AND MODIFIED_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{MODIFIED_DATE}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{MODIFIED_DATE}, 13)

mapper.select: select count(*) from category where CATE_TYPE='BRAND'

SELECT a.CATE_IDX as ori_cate_idx, a.CATE_DEPTH,b.CATE_IDX AS per_cate_idx1, c.CATE_IDX AS per_cate_idx2 FROM category a LEFT JOIN category b ON a.CATE_PARENT_IDX=b.CATE_IDX LEFT JOIN category c ON b.CATE_PARENT_IDX=c.CATE_IDX WHERE a.CATE_IDX = #{CATE_IDX} AND a.CATE_TYPE='CATEGORY'

sql.if: AND CATEGORY.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{createdDate}, 1, 10) AND SUBSTR(#{createdDate}, 13)

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(CATE_IDX)) FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATE_DEPTH=#{cateDepth} AND CATE_TYPE='CATEGORY'
